evidence.claim: The site mentions compliance with HIPAA standards for handling health information.
Integration with FHIR standards is highlighted in resources for electronic health records.
Information on the use of EDI and X12 formats for electronic transactions is provided in the documentation.
Details surrounding compliance and health information processing are available in their security documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions or typical API automation use cases found.
